name: Run & Bun... Kinda
description:
Launch into the air, slash your toppings, and collect them before the bun drops!

Move with the arrow keys, space slashes and jumps, and escape restarts the game.

My first game jam entry, be kind. This is a very basic idea of the game itself, the idea could be iterated on to more properly time the toppings being thrown, better movement in the launch/slash time, and give proper objectives to the player on making specific burgers.
